description: A web page combining HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and embedded PHP for a restaurant reservation form and page layout.

methods.name: isset
methods.description: Checks if a variable is set and is not NULL.

methods.name: mysqli_connect
methods.description: Establishes a new connection to the MySQL server.

methods.name: die
methods.description: Outputs a message and terminates the current script.

methods.name: mysqli_query
methods.description: Performs a query against the database.

methods.name: mysqli_error
methods.description: Returns the last error message for the most recent MySQLi function call.
